It seems that the material theme for the main window is “Light”, which may cause the visibility issues. See

[#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/src/58284a27908100b389a95a493d5c9395c5f8cb47/src/MainWindow.cc#lines-428](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/src/58284a27908100b389a95a493d5c9395c5f8cb47/src/MainWindow.cc#lines-428)

The visibility problems when displaying ign gazebo in Ubuntu Bionic:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/64K5zaR/images/2895942737-ign-gazebo-3.png)
‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/64K5zaR/images/564858121-ign-gazebo-2.png)
‌

I temporally changed the code as follows: this->materialTheme = “Dark”; after recompiling, it works ok. But it’s not flexible. May I ask if there are any solutions to solve this problem?
